verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrīvāsādi gaura-bhakta-gaṇa
jaya śrotā-gaṇa,-yāṅra gaura prāṇa-dhana

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrīvāsa-ādi—headed by Śrīvāsa; gaura-bhakta-gaṇa—to the devotees of Lord Caitanya; jaya—all glories; śrotā-gaṇa—to the hearers; yāṅra—of whom; gaura—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prāṇa-dhana—the life and soul.
translation: All glories to all the devotees, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura! All glories to the readers who have taken Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu as their life and soul.
